description: This module provides exposure to the structure and organisation of real estate markets in emerging and developed markets in Asia. It will cover the institutional framework of the key Asian markets. The field study focuses on one of them with an in-depth appreciation of the institutional and market economy aspects of the subject country including real estate regulation, investment practices and development procedures. Students are expected to complete individual and group reports including recommendations for investment in real estate such as structuring a cross-border venture. However, in the event where actual field trips to another country/city is not possible, students will conduct virtual studies with online lectures.
title: Asian Real Estate Markets and Field Study
